tasksInputPlaceholder: Input the task you need to accomplish, then press enter key!
signUpValidateMsg: * Please enter a valid email address.
* password has to be 6-15 in length , needs to include at least one letter, capital letter, number, and special character.
* password and confirm password is not matching.
signUpNoticeMsg: Please fix the invalid input first.
Error details can be found under the input box, starts with a "*"
makeupsSubTitle: Data are from MakeupAPI, a free public api source. There is no backend pagination setup
Therefore, It takes a while to fetch all data at one time.
In order to enhance the performance, dynamic list items LAZY rendering is utilized.
(Only the list items within the visible screen are rendered.)
